General.Name: Pryme BV
General.Description: Pryme N.V., a cleantech company, engages in the recycling of plastic waste and converting such waste into pyrolysis oil on an industrial scale. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. Pryme N.V. is a subsidiary of Omnis C.V.

2.Name: Mr. Rik H.K. Van Meirhaeghe
2.Title: Exec. Director & Member of Management Board

3.Name: Mr. Boudewijn  van Vliet
3.Title: Exec. Director & Member of Management Board
